COMMAND.NAME: textinfo
COMMAND.PARAMETER: bufferName The unique name of an e93 buffer.

DESCRIPTION.P: Return the total number of lines and characters contained in bufferName.
NOTE: the total number of lines is actually the total number of newline characters.

COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
bufferName is not provided.
bufferName is not an e93 buffer.
